author: smilek
msg: SWFObject v2.0 beta5 http://code.google.com/p/swfobject/ - added to support loading flash content dynamically - this solves the IE click to load active content probem (Microsoft/Eolas patent issue), and also nicely handles cases where client flash player upgrade is needed - the new gems FlashPortlet uses this library to load the flash content - this file is used only by /portal because /desktop has the a reduced/modified version of this library contained in desktop/core.js

author: smilek
msg: update clear portlet-decorator to support desktop; added support for new portlet actions; support for new desktop page editor configuration settings

author: smilek
msg: images for jetspeed.url.loadingIndicatorStep - allow for the loading indicator to show progress when the browser is too bogged down to render the animated gif used in the normal loading indicator - loaddots_R1.gif, loaddots_L8.gif, loaddots_E.gif, loaddots_R3.gif, loaddots_R5.gif, loaddots_R7.gif, loaddots_L2.gif, loaddots_L4.gif, loaddots_L6.gif
